subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Kevin Robinson caught a touchdown pass and returned a punt for a score in the West’s 31-13 victory over the East on Saturday in the East-West Shrine Game in Houston. At Utah State, Robinson set the N.C.A.A. career record for all-purpose yards per play.
